name: Crystal Mine Adventure
description: This is a project made for university where we where asked to build a single player 3d escape room. This was something out of my confort zone since I am not into this type of games. This project was made by me with the help of a programmer, we started this project and finished it in about two weeks to reach the deadline. The game was tested multiple times with the help of multiple people so it is possible to finish, you just need to be pacient.
